data.title: Snatch
data.meta_description: Guy Ritchie's gritty British brofest follows Turkish (Jason Statham - Wild Card), a slot machine shop owner just trying to make some extra cash. But, when he tries to arrange a boxing match with local gangster "Brick Top" (Alan Ford) he gets in over his head. Little did he know he would be pulled into a web of unfortunate events with characters the likes of "One Punch" Mickey O'Neil (Brad Pitt - Once Upon a Time in Hollywood), arms-dealer called Boris "the Blade" (Rade Šerbedžija), Bullet-Tooth Tony (Vinnie Jones - The Big Ugly)and a gambling addict-turned-jewel-thief Franky "Four-Fingers"(Benicio del Toro - Guardians of the Galaxy). Love CherryPicks? Support us by carrying your stolen jewels in this reusable cherry-covered bag to carry your stuff...
